title: Boxing for boys: attack, defence and ringcraft
creator_credit: Colin Bell, Frank Wells and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: Demonstrates the chief form of attack and defence; section of the glove to be used in hitting, portion of the body to be hit; correct stance; the straight left; the right hook; the swing; a lead and an uppercut; side stepping; the cross counter; the parry, blocking; slipping and ducking.
